game.name: Dealicious
game.shortDescription: Dealicious is a cooking-themed kitchen management deck-builder card game. Discover and stack cards together to cook meals, manage your kitchen space and expand eventually hiring staff as you grow your empire. Discover unique cards which offer special abilities/bonuses! Can you collect them all?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dealicious is a cooking-themed kitchen management deck-builder card game. Discover and stack cards together to cook meals, manage your kitchen space and expand eventually hiring staff as you grow your empire. Discover unique cards which offer special abilities/bonuses! Can you collect them all?
